site_name: Southwood Site, University of Greenwich, Avery Hill Road, Avery Hill, London, SE9 2UG
description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a minor material amendment in connection with the planning permission dated 31/01/2023 (Reference: 22/3446/F) for construction of new energy centre with four satellite plant rooms, comprising single storey stand alone building with adjoining external plant compound, single storey stand alone plant room to the west of the David Fussey building, single storey extensions to Grey and Bronte buildings, together with alterations to the Fry building to accommodate internal plant to allow:- Variation to Condition 4 (Plant Noise) where attenuation target of 10dB below the existing background noise level is lowered to 6dB.
